verses.verse: Also, thou son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, prophesy <S%H5012><s%> unto the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%>, Ye mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>:

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Because the enemy <S%H341><s%> hath said <S%H559><s%> against you, Aha <S%H1889><s%>, even the ancient <S%H5769><s%> high places <S%H1116><s%> are ours in possession <S%H4181><s%>:

Therefore prophesy <S%H5012><s%> and say <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Because they have made you desolate <S%H8074><s%>, and swallowed you up <S%H7602><s%> on every side <S%H5439><s%>, that ye might be a possession <S%H4181><s%> unto the residue <S%H7611><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and ye are taken up <S%H5927><s%> in the lips <S%H8193><s%> of talkers <S%H3956><s%>, and are an infamy <S%H1681><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>:

Therefore, ye mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> to the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and to the hills <S%H1389><s%>, to the rivers <S%H650><s%>, and to the valleys <S%H1516><s%>, to the desolate <S%H8074><s%> wastes <S%H2723><s%>, and to the cities <S%H5892><s%> that are forsaken <S%H5800><s%>, which became a prey <S%H957><s%> and derision <S%H3933><s%> to the residue <S%H7611><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%> that are round about <S%H5439><s%>;

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Surely in the fire <S%H784><s%> of my jealousy <S%H7068><s%> have I spoken <S%H1696><s%> against the residue <S%H7611><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and against all Idumea <S%H123><s%>, which have appointed <S%H5414><s%> my land <S%H776><s%> into their possession <S%H4181><s%> with the joy <S%H8057><s%> of all their heart <S%H3824><s%>, with despiteful <S%H7589><s%> minds <S%H5315><s%>, to cast it out <S%H4054><s%> for a prey <S%H957><s%>.

Prophesy <S%H5012><s%> therefore concerning the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and to the hills <S%H1389><s%>, to the rivers <S%H650><s%>, and to the valleys <S%H1516><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Behold, I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> in my jealousy <S%H7068><s%> and in my fury <S%H2534><s%>, because ye have borne <S%H5375><s%> the shame <S%H3639><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%>:

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; I have lifted up <S%H5375><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%>, Surely the heathen <S%H1471><s%> that are about <S%H5439><s%> you, they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> their shame <S%H3639><s%>.

¶ But ye, O mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, ye shall shoot forth <S%H5414><s%> your branches <S%H6057><s%>, and yield <S%H5375><s%> your fruit <S%H6529><s%> to my people <S%H5971><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; for they are at hand <S%H7126><s%> to come <S%H935><s%>.
For, behold, I am for you, and I will turn <S%H6437><s%> unto you, and ye shall be tilled <S%H5647><s%> and sown <S%H2232><s%>:

And I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> men <S%H120><s%> upon you, all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, even all of it: and the cities <S%H5892><s%> shall be inhabited <S%H3427><s%>, and the wastes <S%H2723><s%> shall be builded <S%H1129><s%>:

And I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> upon you man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%>; and they shall increase <S%H7235><s%> and bring fruit <S%H6509><s%>: and I will settle <S%H3427><s%> you after your old estates <S%H6927><s%>, and will do better <S%H2895><s%> unto you than at your beginnings <S%H7221><s%>: and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

Yea, I will cause men <S%H120><s%> to walk <S%H3212><s%> upon you, even my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and they shall possess <S%H3423><s%> thee, and thou shalt be their inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, and thou shalt no more <S%H3254><s%> henceforth bereave <S%H7921><s%> them of men.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Because they say <S%H559><s%> unto you, Thou land devourest up <S%H398><s%> men <S%H120><s%>, and hast bereaved <S%H7921><s%> thy nations <S%H1471><s%>;

Therefore thou shalt devour <S%H398><s%> men <S%H120><s%> no more, neither bereave <S%H7921><s%> <S%H3782><s%> thy nations <S%H1471><s%> any more, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.

Neither will I cause men to hear <S%H8085><s%> in thee the shame <S%H3639><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%> any more, neither shalt thou bear <S%H5375><s%> the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> any more, neither shalt thou cause thy nations <S%H1471><s%> to fall <S%H3782><s%> any more, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.
¶ Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, when the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in their own land <S%H127><s%>, they defiled <S%H2930><s%> it by their own way <S%H1870><s%> and by their doings <S%H5949><s%>: their way <S%H1870><s%> was before <S%H6440><s%> me as the uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> of a removed woman <S%H5079><s%>.

Wherefore I poured <S%H8210><s%> my fury <S%H2534><s%> upon them for the blood <S%H1818><s%> that they had shed <S%H8210><s%> upon the land <S%H776><s%>, and for their idols <S%H1544><s%> wherewith they had polluted <S%H2930><s%> it:

And I scattered <S%H6327><s%> them among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and they were dispersed <S%H2219><s%> through the countries <S%H776><s%>: according to their way <S%H1870><s%> and according to their doings <S%H5949><s%> I judged <S%H8199><s%> them.

And when they entered <S%H935><s%> unto the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, whither they went <S%H935><s%>, they profaned <S%H2490><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>, when they said <S%H559><s%> to them, These are the people <S%H5971><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and are gone forth <S%H3318><s%> out of his land <S%H776><s%>.

¶ But I had pity <S%H2550><s%> for mine holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>, which the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> had profaned <S%H2490><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, whither they went <S%H935><s%>.

Therefore say <S%H559><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; I do <S%H6213><s%> not this for your sakes, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, but for mine holy <S%H6944><s%> name's <S%H8034><s%> sake, which ye have profaned <S%H2490><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, whither ye went <S%H935><s%>.

And I will sanctify <S%H6942><s%> my great <S%H1419><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>, which was profaned <S%H2490><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, which ye have profaned <S%H2490><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of them; and the heathen <S%H1471><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, when I shall be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> in you before their eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

For I will take <S%H3947><s%> you from among <S%H4480><s%> the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and gather <S%H6908><s%> you out of all countries <S%H776><s%>, and will bring <S%H935><s%> you into your own land <S%H127><s%>.

¶ Then will I sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> clean <S%H2889><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> upon you, and ye shall be clean <S%H2891><s%>: from all your filthiness <S%H2932><s%>, and from all your idols <S%H1544><s%>, will I cleanse <S%H2891><s%> you.

A new <S%H2319><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> also will I give <S%H5414><s%> you, and a new <S%H2319><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> will I put <S%H5414><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> you: and I will take away <S%H5493><s%> the stony <S%H68><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> out of your flesh <S%H1320><s%>, and I will give <S%H5414><s%> you an heart <S%H3820><s%> of flesh <S%H1320><s%>.

And I will put <S%H5414><s%> my spirit <S%H7307><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> you, and cause <S%H6213><s%> you to walk <S%H3212><s%> in my statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and ye shall keep <S%H8104><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> them.
And ye shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> that I gave <S%H5414><s%> to your fathers <S%H1><s%>; and ye shall be my people <S%H5971><s%>, and I will be your God <S%H430><s%>.

I will also save <S%H3467><s%> you from all your uncleannesses <S%H2932><s%>: and I will call <S%H7121><s%> for the corn <S%H1715><s%>, and will increase <S%H7235><s%> it, and lay <S%H5414><s%> no famine <S%H7458><s%> upon you.

And I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the tree <S%H6086><s%>, and the increase <S%H8570><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, that ye shall receive <S%H3947><s%> no more reproach <S%H2781><s%> of famine <S%H7458><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>.

Then shall ye remember <S%H2142><s%> your own evil <S%H7451><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%>, and your doings <S%H4611><s%> that were not good <S%H2896><s%>, and shall lothe <S%H6962><s%> yourselves in your own sight <S%H6440><s%> for your iniquities <S%H5771><s%> and for your abominations <S%H8441><s%>.

Not for your sakes do <S%H6213><s%> I this, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, be it known <S%H3045><s%> unto you: be ashamed <S%H954><s%> and confounded <S%H3637><s%> for your own ways <S%H1870><s%>, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; In the day <S%H3117><s%> that I shall have cleansed <S%H2891><s%> you from all your iniquities <S%H5771><s%> I will also cause you to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%>, and the wastes <S%H2723><s%> shall be builded <S%H1129><s%>.
And the desolate <S%H8074><s%> land <S%H776><s%> shall be tilled <S%H5647><s%>, whereas it lay desolate <S%H8077><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all that passed by <S%H5674><s%>.

And they shall say <S%H559><s%>, This <S%H1977><s%> land <S%H776><s%> that was desolate <S%H8074><s%> is become like the garden <S%H1588><s%> of Eden <S%H5731><s%>; and the waste <S%H2720><s%> and desolate <S%H8074><s%> and ruined <S%H2040><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> are become fenced <S%H1219><s%>, and are inhabited <S%H3427><s%>.

Then the heathen <S%H1471><s%> that are left <S%H7604><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> build <S%H1129><s%> the ruined <S%H2040><s%> places, and plant <S%H5193><s%> that that was desolate <S%H8074><s%>: I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it, and I will do <S%H6213><s%> it.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; I will yet for this be inquired <S%H1875><s%> of by the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, to do <S%H6213><s%> it for them; I will increase <S%H7235><s%> them with men <S%H120><s%> like a flock <S%H6629><s%>.

As the holy <S%H6944><s%> flock <S%H6629><s%>, as the flock <S%H6629><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> in her solemn feasts <S%H4150><s%>; so shall the waste <S%H2720><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> be filled <S%H4392><s%> with flocks <S%H6629><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>: and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
